## Required Libraries

```{r library, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

---

## Read Text File

```{r read-text_file, warning=FALSE}

df <- data.frame()

con = file('test.txt', "r")
while (TRUE) {
  line = readLines(con, n = 1)
  
  if (length(line) == 0) {
     break
  }
  
  df <- bind_rows(df, data.frame(line))
}
close(con)

```

``` {r clean dataframe}

# find rows that has alpha-numeric characters
for (row in df){
  df$str_alpha <- str_detect(row, '[a-zA-Z0-9]')
}

# drop non-alpha-numeric rows
df <- df %>% 
  filter(., str_alpha == TRUE) %>%
  select(., line)

# drop first two rows containing header info
df <- df %>%
  slice(-c(1, 2))

```

``` {r test}
player_df = data.frame()

for (i in seq(1, nrow(df), by = 2)){
  row_info <- str_split_fixed(df[i, ],regex("|", literal=TRUE),n=Inf)
  df_temp <- data.frame(row_info)
  player_df <- bind_rows(player_df, df_temp[1:10, ])
  
  row_info <- str_split_fixed(df[i+1, ],regex("|", literal=TRUE),n=Inf)
  df_temp <- data.frame(row_info)
  player_df <- bind_rows(player_df, df_temp[1:10, ])
}

player_df <- player_df %>% 
  select(1:10)

columns= c("player_id", "name", "total_pts", "round_1", "round_2","round_3","round_4","round_5","round_6","round_7")
colnames(player_df) = columns

```
